meanings.definition: Remove lime deposits from (a surface or object).
meanings.sent1: I delimed the shower tiles to make them shiny again.
meanings.sent2: She delimed the kettle to prevent mineral buildup.
meanings.sent3: The bathroom was so clean after I delimed everything.
meanings.sent4: Deliming the sink felt like erasing all the dirt from it.
meanings.sent5: After deliming the faucet, it sparkled like new.

meanings.definition: To clean or treat with a substance that removes lime deposits.
meanings.sent1: We delimed the dishwasher to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: He delimed the coffee maker to improve its performance.
meanings.sent3: Deliming the teapot made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The solution for deliming the shower head worked wonders.
meanings.sent5: After deliming the water filter, the water tasted much better.
